Name: Seraph Wings Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1
Travel with the Seraph Wings mount, which enables High Altitude Flight, to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1
Travel with the Seraph Wings mount, which enables High Altitude Flight, to travel very fast. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you'll automatically fly to the destination by following the navigation line. (Auto-pilot is only available in certain continents, such as Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1
Travel with the Seraph Wings mount, which enables High Altitude Flight, to travel very fast.
